item.title: #TIL 2017-02-23 : database, mysql, quote, testing, til, phpunit, english, php, mistake
item.description: QUOTE Random quote 23 Feb 2017 A computer lets you make more mistakes faster than any other invention in human history, with the possible exceptions of handguns and tequila. - Mitch Ratcliffe Haha, it’s totally true ! And it makes me remember this meme when I was little bit drunk ! PHP Using VarDumper in PHPUnit The trick is writing the output to STDERR stream, I wrote a helper function below
